titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (S. 1301) to provide for the publication by the Secretary of Health and Human Services of physical activity recommendations for Americans.
Providing for consideration of the bill (S. 1301) to provide for the publication by the Secretary of Health and Human Services of physical activity recommendations for Americans.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 688.
The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 117-133, by Mr. McGovern.

Rule provides for consideration of S. 1301 with 1 hour of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions. Measure will be considered read. A specified amendment is in order.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 37.

action.text: On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 217 - 206, 2 Present (Roll no. 305).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 214 - 212 (Roll no. 306).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: This resolution sets forth the rule for consideration of S. 1301 (Promoting Physical Activity for Americans Act). It provides for the adoption of the text of a Rules Committee print as an amendment in the nature of a substitute (substituting the provisions of S. 1301 with provisions that suspend the public debt limit).
